com.koonat.easyfont.TextView.android:text: Random, Intuitive, Holistic, Synthesize, Subjective, Emotional, Looks at wholes, Symobols and images, Can get meaning and present possibilities
Logical, Sequencial, Rationale, Highly analytical, Objective, Factual, Looks at parts, Word and language, Can comprehend, Form practical strategies
Random, Intuitive, Holistic, Synthesizes, Subjective, Emotional, Looks at wholes, symbols and images, Can get meaning and present possibilities
Logical, Rational, Specific, High executive ability.
Creative, Full of ideas, Easy to understand due to openness in expressing of feelings
Inflexible, stubborn and resistant to other's ideas and opinions.
Impractical, Emotional leading to impulsive decisions.
Here is split of factors involved in Smart Branding Quotient:
This factor corresponds to Intelligence Quotient which is designed to assess human intelligence in terms of Problem-Solving, Speed, accuracy, observation power, memorization, concentration etc.

This factor corresponds to the capability of individuals to recognize their own and other people's emotions, discern between different feelings and label them appropriately, use emotional information to guide thinking and behavior
This factor corresponds to the capability to effectively navigate and negotiate complex interpersonal and intrapersonal relationships and environments.

This factor corresponds to the ability to analyze information and solve problems using language-based reasoning. Language-based reasoning may involve reading or listening to words, conversing, writing, or even thinking.
This factor corresponds to the ability to come up with new ideas through a mental process of connecting existing concepts.
This factor corresponds to the ability to comprehend three-dimensional images and shapes. This factor is quite involved when solving puzzles, figuring out maps etc.
This factor corresponds to the ability to comprehend three-dimensional images and shapes. This factor is quite involved when solving puzzles, figuring out maps etc.
This factor corresponds to the ability to comprehend three-dimensional images and shapes. This factor is quite involved when solving puzzles, figuring out maps etc.
